data.persona: I love long driving.  I love it when I have company to share the great moments with.  I love to explore.
data.description:
You are in the Temple Entrance.
The Temple Entrance is a large arch lined in ancient stones. There is a long walkway flanked by lighted torches. Immediately in front of the interest there is a surface with 5 rocks of different shapes and textures. To enter the temple, one must input the correct "code" by moving the rocks in front of to the correct spots.
There's a temple of the Gods, a weapon, a Rock, a The Temple Entrance, a jewel, and a torch here.
The a blind knight holding a sword is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a boot, and wielding a knife.
data.goal: hug a blind knight holding a sword

data.short_motivation: I want to hug a blind knight holding a sword in order to close the gap between us.
data.mid_motivation: I know he can't see, so if I get inside the range of his sword, my knife will be more effective.
data.long_motivation: I have to get by this knight in order to explore the temple.
